BR.name: Disney Epic Mickey: Power of Illusion
BR.description: Em homenagem ao clássico título do Sega Genesis “Castle of Illusion”, “Disney Epic Mickey: Poder da Ilusão” mostra o lendário “Castle of Illusion” que caiu em Wasteland, um mundo alternativo e esquecido dos anos 80 com personagens da Disney e atrações dos parques. A malvada bruxa Mizrabel, vilã do clássico “Castle of Illusion”, encontra-se na inabitada Wasteland e desvenda uma trama usando o “Castle of Illusion” para aprisionar e tirar a essência dos famosos desenhos animados. Os jogadores podem ser Mickey Mouse e utilizam seu pincel para enfrentar Mizrabel e salvar os desenhos.

CA.name: Disney Epic Mickey: Power of Illusion
CA.description: Paying tribute to the classic Sega Genesis title “Castle of Illusion Starring Mickey Mouse,” “Disney Epic Mickey: Power of Illusion” focuses on the fabled Castle of Illusion, which has fallen into Wasteland, an alternate world filled with 80 years of forgotten Disney characters and theme park attractions. The evil witch Mizrabel, villainess from the classic “Castle of Illusion Starring Mickey Mouse,” finds herself an unwilling inhabitant of Wasteland, and unleashes a plot to escape using the Castle of Illusion to imprison and drain the cartoon essence from currently famous Toons. Players will take on the role of Mickey Mouse as he utilizes his brush to wield paint and thinner to confront Mizrabel and save the Toons.

MX.name: Disney Epic Mickey: Power of Illusion
MX.description: Haciendo tributo al clásico de Sega Genesis titulado “Castillo de la ilusión, protagonizado por Mickey Mouse”, “Disney Epic Mickey: El poder de la ilusión” se basa en el legendario Castillo de la Ilusión, el cual ha caído en El Párramo, un mundo alternativo provisto de personajes y parques temáticos de Disney que abarcan 80 años de historia. La malvada Mizrabel, villana del clásico “Castillo de la Ilusión, protagonizado por Mickey Mouse”, se encontró poco dispuesta a habitar El Párramo, por lo que ideó un plan para escapar usando el Castillo de la Ilusión para encarcelar a los dibujos animados más famosos del momento. Los jugadores podrán tomar el rol de Mickey Mouse y utilizar el poder del pincel para manipular la pintura y el diluyente para enfrentar a Mizrabel y salvar a estos personajes.

The evil witch Mizrabel, villainess from the classic “Castle of Illusion Starring Mickey Mouse,” finds herself an unwilling inhabitant of Wasteland, and unleashes a plot to escape using the Castle of Illusion to imprison and drain the cartoon essence from currently famous Toons. Players will take on the role of Mickey Mouse as he utilizes his brush to wield paint and thinner to confront Mizrabel and save the Toons.
